digest_items.title: Use subresource integrity (SRI)
digest_items.why: SRI prevents compromised CDN resources from executing malicious code
digest_items.fix: Add integrity attribute to script and link tags loading external resources

digest_items.title: Verify encryption in transit
digest_items.why: Unencrypted data transmission exposes sensitive information
digest_items.fix: Enforce HTTPS for all endpoints and use TLS for internal services

digest_items.title: Scan for exposed .git directories
digest_items.why: Exposed .git folders can leak source code and sensitive configuration
digest_items.fix: Block access in web server config or use .htaccess: 'RedirectMatch 404 /\.git'

digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training

digest_items.title: Use HSTS headers
digest_items.why: HTTP Strict Transport Security forces browsers to only connect via HTTPS
